e6.title: Trailhead and Lightning Component Development
e6.description: Sara Morgan Nettles from Trailhead team joins the show to talk about Trailhead platform and Lightning Component development. I am especially inspired by Sara's diligence and the amount of great achievement she has done in the professional career. Check out her 'about me' page linked in the show notes for more information!

e5.title: Finland Salesforce Academy
e5.description: Salesforce Academy trains unemployed people to skill up and join Salesforce ecosystem. Salesforce consultant Elli Pennanen is here with us to share her Salesforce Academy Journey.

e4.title: Advanced Apex and PluralSight
e4.description: Multi-hats wearing Salesforce MVP Dan Appleman shares his splendid knowledge and experience on various topics.

e3.title: 3rd party frameworks
e3.description: Nikita drops by to share his invaluable experience of using popular 3rd party frameworks in Salesforce

e2.title: Finland local user group
e2.description: Juho Kilkku joins us to talk about creating and hosting Finland local user group story as well as his certified instructor role.

e1.title: Salesforce Certificates
e1.description: In the first episode, we invited Olli Timperi to share his experience in acquiring Salesforce certificates.
